title: Velocity control via the joints SetVelocity method drifts significantly

content.raw: I am trying to control a robots joints via velocity commands using the `joint->SetVelocity(0,vel_cmd)` call, and the robot drifts wildly with an unchanging command. I have [seen](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/4294/joints-drift-when-they-are-not-being-driven-or-have-a-set-velocity-of-zero/) [countless](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/12952/robot-base-slowly-drifting/) [threads](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/7142/strange-behaviour-of-robot-model-when-using-jointsetvelocity-velocityjointinterface/) out there where people have had the same issue but there doesn't ever appear to be a concrete solution, so i'm asking the question again here. My joint effort limits are 20k, velocity limits are 10k just because I have seen threads saying to try increasing those, but it has zero effect.
